sections.title: Debugging
sections.imageText: Icon of a bug with a magnifying glass

mainResource.title: Get Started with Debugging JavaScript in Chrome DevTools

sections.intro: Step through code as it executes to identify and fix errors
sections.callToAction: Examine and fix some broken code
tasks: Watch the tutorial from Google Developers
Download the hair stylist page and fix the bugs in main.js

sections.title: Event Listeners
sections.subHeading: Run your code based on user input
sections.intro: We can use addEventListener to respond to user actions
sections.callToAction: Use events to make your DOM interactive
tasks: Try the different mouse event listeners to learn what they do
Read about the different event types to what you can respond to
Read the docs to learn some more advanced tricks
